metadata.title: Document Supabase Google Auth Setup Instructions
metadata.prd_reference: Deployment and third-party integration setup docs

context.background: User needs step-by-step instructions to configure Google login in Supabase for local and Vercel deployments.

design_constraints.constraint: Document local and production callback URLs using Healio's `/auth/callback` route.
Clearly separate Google Cloud setup, Supabase provider configuration, and Healio env/app setup.

instruction.step: Add a dedicated step-by-step setup guide for Supabase Google OAuth (Google Cloud, Supabase Auth provider, env vars, callback URLs, test flow).
Link the new guide from `healio/README.md` in the Supabase/Auth setup sections.
Verify docs references are accurate to current Healio auth routes (`/auth/login`, `/auth/signup`, `/auth/callback`).

validation_checklist.check: Guide includes local and production redirect URL examples.
Guide includes Supabase and Google Cloud console steps.
README points users to the guide.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Repository contains a practical Google OAuth setup guide for Supabase + Healio.
Task XML is updated with evidence and renamed `DONE_` on completion.

output_spec.commit_message: docs(healio-auth): add supabase google auth setup guide

execution_tracking.verification_command: rg route references in healio/docs/supabase-google-auth-setup.md and healio/README.md
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Added dedicated Supabase Google OAuth setup guide covering Google Cloud, Supabase provider config, redirect URLs (local + production), env vars, verification flow, and troubleshooting. Linked guide from README Supabase section.
